title: Automatic Text Linking
description: In this lab, we will work on creating an Automatic Text Linking component using React. The purpose of this lab is to learn how to use regular expressions to find URLs in a string and convert them into appropriate link elements. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to automatically link URLs in text using React.

meta.title: Automatic Text Linking with React
meta.description: Learn how to create an Automatic Text Linking component using React and regular expressions to find and convert URLs in text.
meta.keywords: url conversion, regular expressions, automatic text linking, react, web development
